about.title: About me
about.bio: I am a passionate developer specialized in full-stack, mobile and database development. Graduated in computer programming and currently studying Computer Engineering Technology at La Cité Collégiale, I have acquired solid experience in creating modern web and mobile applications.

education.title: Education
education.description1: Complete training in computer programming with practical projects
education.description2: Ongoing training in computer engineering technology

projects.title: My projects
projects.noResults: No projects found for this filter.

ecommerce.title: Artisan Carpentry E-Commerce
ecommerce.description: Complete full-stack e-commerce application for an artisan carpentry business. The project includes two frontend interfaces (client and manager) and a robust REST API backend developed with Laravel. Features: secure authentication, product catalog, persistent shopping cart with automatic synchronization, complete order system, administration interface with dashboards and statistics, real-time stock management.

medical.title: Medical staff management application
medical.description: Desktop application for medical staff management with intuitive interface and complete features.

climate.title: Climate database
climate.description: Database for tracking pollution, precipitation and other climate data.

equipment.title: CortexIT - IT Equipment Management System
equipment.description: Complete SaaS application for IT equipment inventory and maintenance management with multi-tenant architecture. Modern full-stack solution with secure authentication (JWT), user management with 4 roles (ADMIN, MANAGER, TECHNICIAN, USER), complete equipment and maintenance management, real-time dashboards with charts, and multilingual interface (FR/EN) with modern SaaS-style design.

marathon.title: VelocityRun - Marathon website
marathon.description: Bilingual website (FR/EN) developed with Next.js 15 and React 19 to promote running events in Ottawa. The project includes a complete internationalization system, a contact form with real-time validation, a dynamic countdown, and complete SEO optimization. Features: i18n (FR/EN), Server Actions, Resend API, dynamic countdown, responsive design, SEO optimization (Lighthouse Score > 90).

android.title: Android management application
android.description: Android application developed with Java/Kotlin for task and project management.
